title: Proportional Reasoning Learning Design Using Cognitive Tutors

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations and understanding of fractional concepts
context.additional_context: A course aligned with vocational institutions' demand for practical math education, enhancing proportional reasoning skills through Cognitive Tutors (CTs) with personalized interaction considering individual learning pace differences.

learning_goals: Students demonstrate the ability to solve real-world problems (e.g., discount rates, ratio calculations) using proportional relationships (ratio=quantity/quantity) with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can identify and correct at least three error patterns based on real-time feedback provided by the CT system.
Post-training evaluation results show a 40% or greater improvement in learners' conceptual understanding of proportional reasoning compared to pre-assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
